string-array.name: bandDesc
string-array.item: Breakfast in Bed is Santa Clara\'s newest and greatest band. Formed in 2013, they are quickly taking over the world.
Mumford and Sons is london\'s best folk and rock group.
Smashmouth is a childhood classic. Everyone likes Smashmouth.
Florence, like the machine, is a moving and grooving mix of rock and roll.
WuTang is the OG rap group. RZA, Killer Mike, and the boys hold it down.
